Tender Notice (Subject to Revision)
=============================

Title:
 Simultaneous Interpreters

Tender Number:
`solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation`
24062-24-010-001

Publication Date:
`publicationDate-datePublication`
2024-05-16

Tender Closing Date:
`tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture`
14:00:00 on 2024-05-29

Description:
A **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the provision of **Simultaneous Interpreters** services has been issued by the Department of Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat. 

Schedule:
The anticipated contract starting date is on `expectedContractStartDate-dateDebutContratPrevue` and the expiring date is `expectedContractEndDate-dateFinContratPrevue`.

Contact Information:
Dawn Dormer  
Phone: (343) 542-8102  
Email: dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca  
Address: 90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R5, Canada.


Attachments:
